@deepend Hello! üëã Welcome to Yarn.social / Twtxt ü•≥

↳ In-reply-to ¬ª Good news:

@carsten@yarn.zn80.net This is good news indeed ü•≥

↳ In-reply-to ¬ª @prologic This is the best I found, please take a look: https://doodle.com/meeting/participate/id/e71VJKAb

Here (on Yarn / Twtxt) you get to know who people are by interacting with them and getting to know one another üòÖ Even when we have our Yarn.social Weekly calls I call y‚Äôall by your feed names üòÖ

↳ In-reply-to ¬ª @prologic This is the best I found, please take a look: https://doodle.com/meeting/participate/id/e71VJKAb

@eaplmx I know you and I have a lot of ‚Äúthings‚Äù going on, but we should try to build this. I know @darch@neotxt.dk has wanted something like this as well‚Ä¶ I really want to see more things integrated into the Yarn.social ecosystem, because yeah we really do take privacy quite seriously and as you probably aware away, go out of our way to ensure there is no ‚ÄúPersonal Information‚Äù (PII) stored, collected or otherwise.

↳ In-reply-to ¬ª @prologic This is the best I found, please take a look: https://doodle.com/meeting/participate/id/e71VJKAb

And by ‚ÄúYarn native‚Äù I mean, get updates as a feed itself üòÖ

↳ In-reply-to ¬ª @prologic This is the best I found, please take a look: https://doodle.com/meeting/participate/id/e71VJKAb

@eaplmx Also I‚Äôm thinking‚Ä¶ Can we build something similar to this, or fork something that‚Äôs close and add IndieAuth support so we can sign-in with our respective Yarn.social pod accounts? ü§î This would be ideal as it means we preserve who we are without giving away any actual personal information (PPII) ‚Äì I notice this tool wants your Name / Email Address (okay the name you can make up or use an alias) but the Email is a bit well questionable (sure you can get updates, but it would be nicer if it was Yarn native I guess?)

↳ In-reply-to ¬ª Shall we do the Yarn/social weekly call now since it appears most people are awake and available?

@eaplmx I did it üëå As you‚Äôre the organiser, please let me know how many other responses you get. I tried to have two fairly wide options for me so hopefully that means we can have two sessions and we can have as many folks from the community join üëå

↳ In-reply-to ¬ª Shall we do the Yarn/social weekly call now since it appears most people are awake and available?

@eaplmx Hmmm can someone find a online tool where we can anonymously or so pick a time-slot that works best for each, but on a single 24hr period of time. That is to say, I don‚Äôt mind holding two sessions, and I don‚Äôt mind staying up late just to do so one day a week, but I need two UTC time-slots on my Saturday (the only day I can really do this, because I also have a day job and need to sleep on Sundays üòÖ)
